#Guiyi army of Shazhou and Guazhou

1400000 = { #Unnamed father of Yichao and Yitan
	dynasty = 1000048000 #Zhang
	name = " " 
	culture = han
	religion = taoist
	trait = tough_soldier
	750.1.1 = {
		birth = yes
	}
	825.1.1 = {
		death = yes
	}
}
1400001 = { #張義潮 Zhang Yichao. 歸義節度使 until 867.3.10.
	dynasty = 1000048000 #Zhang
	name = "Yichao" 
	culture = han
	religion = taoist
	trait = tough_soldier
	father = 1400000
	799.1.1 = {
		birth = yes
	}
	867.3.10 = { employer = 217717 }
	872.9.7 = {
		death = yes #Died at Chang'an
	}
}
1400002 = { #Zhang Yitan 張議潭, elder brother of Yichao
	dynasty = 1000048000 #Zhang
	name = "Yitan" 
	culture = han
	religion = taoist
	father = 1400000
	#Birth and death dates unknown
	797.1.1 = {
		birth = yes
	}
	850.1.1 = {
		death = yes #The post of Jiedushi after the death of Yichao went to the son of Yitan, so it's possible that he died before that point.
	}
}
1400003 = { #張淮深 Zhang Huaishen. 歸義節度使 in 867.3.10.
	dynasty = 1000048000 #Zhang
	name = "Huaishen" 
	culture = han
	religion = taoist
	father = 1400002
	#Birth and death dates unknown
	831.1.1 = {
		birth = yes
	}
	890.2.22 = {
		death = { death_reason = death_murder killer = 1400004 } #reasons for death are being debated, but it is likely that he was either killed by Huaiding or Suo Xun
	}
}

1400029 = { #孟遷 Meng Qian. Until 899.10.22 汾州刺史. In 900.8.22 made 昭義節度使. In 901.4.21 surrendered to Zhu Quanzhong. In 901.7.19 made 河陽節度使.
	dynasty = 1000048031 #Meng
	name = "Qian"

	}

1400030 = { #孟知祥 Meng Zhixiang. In 923.5.13 made 太原尹, 西京留守. 北都留守 in 925.10.1. 926.1.4 made 西川節度使. 933.3.15 made 蜀王.
	dynasty = 1000048031 #Meng
	name = "Zhixiang" 
	culture = han
	religion = taoist
	father=1400028
	trait = skilled_tactician
	trait = skilled_warrior
	trait = ambitious
	874.6.9 = {
		birth = yes
	}
	890.1.1 = { employer = 1412310 }
	907.11.13 = {
		create_bloodline = {
			type = later_shu_bloodline
			has_dlc = "Holy Fury"
		}
	}
	908.2.24 = { employer = 1412318 }
	933.9.1 = {
		trait = ill
	}
	934.9.7 = {
		death = {death_reason death_trait }
		name = "Gaozu"
		effect = {
			set_character_flag = given_temple_name_by_script
		}
	}
}

1400267 = { #杜重威 Du Chongwei or 杜威 Du Wei. 937.8.13 made 昭義節度使. In 938.12.7 made 忠武節度使. (舊五代史/卷77) In 940.4.19 made 鄆州節度使. (舊五代史/卷79) 天平節度使 in 941.8.25. (資治通鑑/卷274) In 926.6.25 made 義成節度使, but soldiers refused to follow him, so he didn't take the office. 滄州節度使 until 927.8.23, on that day made 兗州節度使. (舊五代史/卷81) 徐州節度使 until 945.6.7, on that day made 兗州節度使. (舊五代史/卷83) In 946.2.23 made 晉昌軍節度使. (舊五代史/卷84)

1401540 = { #李回 Li Hui or 李躔 Li Chan. In 847.9.16 made 西川節度使. (資治通鑑/卷248) 西川節度使 until 848.3.3, on that day made 湖南觀察使. (資治通鑑/卷248) 湖南觀察使 until 848.10.8, on that day demoted to 賀州刺史. (資治通鑑/卷248)

1401660 = { #陳思讓 Chen Sirang. 作坊使 in 941. After Congjin was pacified (942.9.13) made 坊州刺史. (宋史/卷261) In 943 made 磁州刺史. (宋史/卷261) Soon later moved to 衛州. (宋史/卷261) Later made 隨州刺史. (宋史/卷261) In 947 made 淄州刺史. (宋史/卷261)  When 馬希灊 and 馬希廣 fought at Hunan (951.1.24), Sirang was sent to 郢州. (宋史/卷261) After the start on Later Zhou made 磁州刺史, alter promoted to 團練. (宋史/卷261) In 951.4.13 reported as former 淄州刺史. In 951.10.4 made 知絳州, year later made 絳州防禦使. (宋史/卷261) In 954.9.30 made 亳州防禦使. (宋史/卷261) 亳州防禦使 until 955.7.11, on that day made 邢州留後. (舊五代史/卷115) 邢州留後 until 959.1.30, on that day made 滑州留後. (舊五代史/卷118) 義成節度留後 in 959.6.14, on that day made also 雄州都部署. 滑州留後 until 959.8.23, on that day made 滄州節度使. (舊五代史/卷120) In 964 made 保信軍節度. (宋史/卷261) In 969 made 護國軍節度、河中尹. (宋史/卷261)
	dynasty = 1000048320 #Lulong Chen

1401692 = { #韓德讓 Han Derang or 耶律隆運 Yelü Longyun. Fourth son of Han Kuangsi according to 惕隱司秦王帳空寧敵烈太保墓誌, second son according to 遼史. During Jingzong's reign made 東京供奉官, later regent of Nanjing. 知南京留守事 in 979.8.19. (遼史/卷9) 遼興軍節度使 until 981.12.29, on that day made 南院樞密使. (遼史/卷9) Later entered the court and became 南院樞密使. After the enthronment of Shengzong and regency of Queen dowager, Derang was relaged to palace guards. In 985 政事令. Next year lead forces in victory over Cao Bin and Mi Xin, for which was made Duke of Chu and soon after elevated to Prince of Chu. In 994 北府宰相兼領樞密使 and soon after also 北院樞密使, elevated to rank 大丞相 and made Prince of Qi. At that time held power over whole Liao army. In 1011.4.11 died. (遼史/卷15)

1401693 = { #韓德威 Han Dewei, courtesy name 普鄰 Pulin. Fifith son of Han Kuangsi according to 惕隱司秦王帳空寧敵烈太保墓誌, third son according to 遼史. Between 969 and 979 made an official in Shangjing and prefect of Ruzhou 儒州防禦使, 北院宣徽使. In 983 because his father died, succeeded temporarily 西南招討使. Later this year five tribes of Tanguts raided southwest, Han Dewei Pacified them. Was made 領知突呂不部、迭剌部糾軍, pacified 稍古葛, and was made officially 西南招討使. In 986 together with Tigin Yelü Shanpu defeated Yang Ye. In 988 made 開府儀同三司, 政事令、門下平章事. Because Chengyi in Shanxi fell his command over troops was removed. In 992 Li Jiqian appeased Song, so Han Dewei led an expedition against Xi Xia and plundered Lingzhou. In 996 once again struck at Tanguts. Died the same year at the age of 55.
	dynasty = 1000048327 #Han
	name = "Dewei"
	religion = taoist
	culture = han
	father = 1401679

In 1032 made 北院宣徽使, 右林牙、副點檢，拜惕隱，改西北路招討使，封漆水郡王. Later because he defrauded tributes from Uyghurs and Zubu he was removed from the post. LAter once again became 北院宣徽使. In 1050 made 烏古敵烈部詳穩, later 東北路詳穩, 混同郡王. In 1055 南府宰相, 鄧王. Because of advanced age asked for retirement and made 漢王. Died sometime between 1075 and 1084 at the age of 80.

1401741 = { #耶律恕 Yelü Ru, Khitan name 耨里 Nouli. Member of Han household according to 金史. Due to lack of futher data on the parenthood, I'll make him a son of Abu. He liked reading books. Due to his knowledge of both Khitan scripts was early given a post. In 1122 Tianzuo escaped west and Liao fell. In 3rd month Ru surrendered to Jin along with Yelü Gaoba and was made a general under the command of Wanyan Loushi. Together with Marshal Wanyan Zonghan they invaded Song, Ru led the vanguard. In 1133 he took part in the battle of Hesheng Plain under the command of Wanyan Zongbi. Next year he took part in the battle of Xianran pass. Due to his skillful command of troops he was recommended to the post of the deputy prefect of Taiyuan and Zhending by Wanyan Zongpu. Later made 行台兵部侍郎、尚書左司郎中. After the enthronment of Wanyan Liang he was made a 沁南軍節度使 and 工部尚書. In 1150 安國軍節度使. In 1153 參知政事. In 1154 prefect of Xingzhong. In 1156 retired and made a prince of Guangping. The same year he died.
	dynasty = 1000048327 #Han
	name = "Nouli"
	religion = taoist
	culture = han
	father = 1401716
	trait = skilled_tactician
	1088.1.1 = {
		birth = yes
	}
	1156.1.1 = {
		death = yes
	}
}

1402977	= { #牛僧孺 Niu Sengru.  Married the eldest daughter of 辛祕. In 825.2.2 made 鄂州刺史，充武昌軍節度、鄂岳觀察使. (舊唐書/卷17上) 武昌軍節度 until 830.2.12, on that day returned to court. (舊唐書/卷17下) In 833.1.1 made 揚州大都督府長史，充淮南節度使. (舊唐書/卷17下) In 837.6.15 made 東都留守. (舊唐書/卷17下) 東都留守 until 838.10.15, on that day made 左僕射. (舊唐書/卷17下) In 839.9.25 made 襄州刺史，充山南東道節度使. (舊唐書/卷17下) In 842 had his military control removed.  (舊唐書/卷163)

1404804 = {#任得敬 Ren Dejing. First a Controller-general 通判 at Xi'an 西安州. In 1137 he surrendered to Xi Xia after Xi'an was taken by them. Made a prefect by Quanshun. In 1138 in order to curry a favour with the Emperor he introduced his daughter to the palace. In 1137 she became a concubine and he was made a Defense and Security Commissioner at Jingzhou 靜州防禦使. Due to bribery he rose in ranks at the court and became a high offical. In 1138 he was able to make his daughter an Empress, while he himself because Imperial father-in-law 上國丈爷 and he a Supreme Commander at Jingzhou 都統軍. In 1139 his daughter becomes Empress Dowager, even though the next Emperor is not her biological son. In 1140 as a reward for pacifying the rebellion of Xiao Heda 蕭合達 he is enfeoffed as Duke of Xiping 西平公 and made Supreme Commander of Xiangqing Army 翔慶軍都統軍. In 1143 he pacifies agrarian revolts in Xianzhou and Dingzhou 威州、定州等. In 1147 he conspires to have more say in the government, but is stopped by Wo Daozhong 斡道冲 and other ministers. In 1149 he is made 尚書令 中書令. In 1156 he becomes a Prime Minister 國相 after the death of Chage, his younger brothers Decong a Captain of Palace guards 殿前太尉, Degong Governor of Capital Prefecture Xingqing 興慶府尹. Soon after he forces Renzong to make him Prince of Chu 楚王. In 1165 he build a fortress in Lingzhou and a palace for himself, requests control over Shazhou, Guazhou, Lingzhou and Xiazhou. In 1170 he creates a fief for himself, Renzong is forced to consent and gives Southwestern Circuit 西南路, Xiping 西平府, Lingzhou 靈州 and other provinces to Chu. He asks for recognition from Jin, but is rebuked and instead offers a two-side attack on Jin to Song. However, his plot is discovered and Renzong with the support of Jin captures and executes Ren brothers in 8th month.
	dynasty=1000048728 #Ren
	name="Dejing"
	religion=taoist
	culture = han
	father=1404803
	
	trait = ambitious
	#birth date unknown
	1100.1.1 = {
		birth=yes
	}
	1137.1.1 = {
		employer=206654
	}
	1139.1.1 = {
		employer=206657
	}
	1170.8.1 = {
		death= {death_reason=death_execution killer=206657}
	}
}

In 881.8.29 made 奉國軍防禦使 (Caizhou) and soon after 光州刺史. In 883.6.9 surrendered to Huang Chao. 蔡州節度使 in 884.7.13. In 886.8.4 took 許州. In 887.6.3 was defeated gravely by Zhu Quanzhong and all his followers fled. In 887.12.18 took Zhengzhou. In 889.1.6 was captured by 申叢 and crippled. In 889.2.23 was sent to Zhu Quanzhong.

(舊五代史/卷13) In 882.11.28 took over as 天平留後 until 883.2.11, on that day made 節度使. (資治通鑑/卷255) In 897.2.25 captured by Zhu Quanzhong's forces together with his wife and children. In 897.3.9 executed. 1406062 = { #朱瑾 Zhu Jin. In 886 forced out 齊克讓 and declared himself 泰寧留後. Later confirmed by the court as 泰寧節度使. (資治通鑑/卷256) In 897.3.9 葛從周 captured his wife and children. Zhu Jin had no place to return to, so he took soldiers and together with 史儼 and 李承嗣 he joined up with Yang Xingmi. Xingmi made him 武寧節度使. Zhu Quanzhong made his wife a nun. (資治通鑑/卷261) In 902.5.1 made 平盧節度使. (資治通鑑/卷264) In 918.7.24 made 靜淮節度使 at 泗州 by 徐知訓, for which Jin started to hate him. Soon after he invited him to a party and killed him. The same day he killed himself and his family was executed. (資治通鑑/卷270)
	dynasty = 1000048847 #Xiayi Zhu
	name = "Jin" 
	culture = han
	religion = taoist
	father = 1406058
	trait = skilled_tactician
	trait = skilled_warrior
	trait = brave
	trait = wroth
	trait = cruel
	trait = bright
	trait = ambitious
	867.1.1 = {
		birth=yes

		birth=yes
	}
	2.2.1 = {
		death = yes
		create_bloodline = {
			type = yanzi_bloodline
			has_dlc = "Holy Fury"
		}
	}
}

1406215 = { #李彭奴 Li Pengnu or 徐知誥 Xu Zhigao or 徐誥 Xu Gao or 李昪 Li Bian. In 912.5.30 made 升州刺史. (資治通鑑/卷268) In 917.5.24 made 潤州團練使. (資治通鑑/卷269) In 918.7.24 took over as regent of Wu. In 918.9.5 made 淮南節度行軍副使 and 江州團練使. In 919.5.3 made 左僕射. (資治通鑑/卷270) In 921.11.15 made 江州觀察使, 奉化軍節度使. (資治通鑑/卷271) In 927.11.20 made 洪州節度使, but didn't go. In 930.1.3 made 寧國節度使. (資治通鑑/卷276) In 931.12.23 made 鎮海、寧國節度使，鎮金陵. (資治通鑑/卷277) In 932.12.11 made also 德勝節度使. (資治通鑑/卷278) In 935.11.18 made 齊王 and 、潤、宣、池、歙、常、江、饒、信、海十州 were made 齊國. (資治通鑑/卷279) In 937.5.2 changed name to 徐誥. In 937.10.11 enthroned as the Emperor of Tang. (資治通鑑/卷281) In 939.2.14 changed family name to 李. In 939.3.11 changed name to 李昪. (資治通鑑/卷282) In 943.3.30 died. (資治通鑑/卷283)
	dynasty = 1000048861 #Li
	name = "Pengnu"
	culture = han
	religion = taoist
	father = 1406213
	trait = bright
	trait = fair
	trait = skilled_warrior
	trait = ambitious
	trait = midas_touched
	889.1.7 = {
		birth=yes
	}
	895.3.30 = { 
		name = "Zhigao" 
		dynasty = 1000048943 #Xu
		father = 1407208
		effect = { 
			set_real_father = 1406213 
		}
		trait = adopted
		employer = 1407208
	}
	912.1.1 = { effect= {ROOT= {add_consort=c_1406246}} }
	937.5.2 = {
		name = "Gao"
	}
	937.10.11 = {
		create_bloodline = {
			type = southern_tang_bloodline
			has_dlc = "Holy Fury"
		}
	}
	939.2.14 = {
		dynasty = 1051150 #Longxi Li
		father = 1406213
		remove_trait = adopted
	}
	939.3.11 = { name = "Bian" }
	943.3.30 = {
		death = yes
		name = "Liezu"
		effect = { set_character_flag = given_temple_name_by_script }
	}
}

(資治通鑑/卷281) 天雄節度使, 金陵尹 until 943.8.16, on that day returned to capital. (資治通鑑/卷283) In 958.3.28 made 晉王，加天策上將軍、江南西道兵馬元帥、洪州大督都、太尉. In 958.9.17 drank poison and died. (資治通鑑/卷294)

1406493 = { #韋丹 Wei Dan. In 804 made 容州刺史容管經略招討使. (唐故江西觀察使韋公墓志銘) 容管經略招討使 until 805.6.9, on that day made 河南少尹 (but didn't go there). (舊唐書/卷14) In 805 made 鄭滑行軍司馬. (唐故江西觀察使韋公墓志銘) In 806.1.10 made 東川節度使. (資治通鑑/卷236) In 806.4.25 appointed 高崇文 東川節度副使、知節度事. (資治通鑑/卷237) In 806.4.27 made 晉絳觀察使/晉慈隰等州觀察防禦使. (舊唐書/卷14/唐故江西觀察使韋公墓志銘) A year later made 洪州刺史江南西道觀察使. (唐故江西觀察使韋公墓志銘) 韋丹 洪州刺史 in 808. (新唐書/041) Married a daughter of 支江縣縣令崔諷, and later a daughter of 蕭恆. (唐故江西觀察使韋公墓志銘)

1406521 = { #劉隱 Liu Yin. On his father's death was made 封州刺史 by 劉崇龜. (資治通鑑/卷259) Killed 譚弘𤣱 in 897.1.7 and then moved into 廣州 and killed 盧琚. (資治通鑑/卷260) In 901.1.13 made 清海留後. 1406713 = { #王潮 Wang Chao. In 886.9.2 took over 泉州. Hearing of Chen Yan's reputation he swore allegiance to him and was made 泉州刺史. (資治通鑑/卷256) In 891 he was made a deputy at 福建觀察使 and fought with 范暉諷 over the Jiedushi title after Chen Yan's death. (資治通鑑/卷258) In 893.5.22 he declared himself 福建留後, gave his daughter in marriage to 陳延晦, while 汀州 and 建州 surrendered without fight. In 893.11.15 made 福建觀察使. (資治通鑑/卷259) In 896.10.12 made 威武節度使. (資治通鑑/卷260) Died in 898.1.2 after a sickness. (資治通鑑/卷261)

	name = "Chao"
	religion = taoist
	culture = han

	trait = kind

1406726 = { #王延鈞 Wang Yanjun. After Liu Yan declared himself an Emperor Yanjun married his daughter. (資治通鑑/卷270) A month after Yanhan's enthronment (926.11.13) was made 泉州刺史. In 927.1.14 became 威武留後 after Yanhan's death. In 927.6.5 made 威武節度使 (資治通鑑/卷275) In 928.8.13 made 閩王. (資治通鑑/卷276) In 932.2.2 resigned from the throne and became a monk named 玄錫. In 932.4.30 returned to the throne. (資治通鑑/卷277) In 933.2.8 declared himself an Emperor, changed name to 王璘. In 933.5.31 once again retired to become a monk. In 933.8.7 back at the throne. (資治通鑑/卷278) In 935.11.17 killed in mutiny by 李倣. (資治通鑑/卷279)
	dynasty = 1000048906 #Gushi Wang
	name = "Yanjun"

	culture = han
	father = 1406717

	trait = zealous

		birth = yes

		name = "Lin" 
		trait = greedy
	}

1406731 = { #王延政 Wang Yanzheng. In 931.5.20 made 建州撫慰吏民. In 931.12.10 made 建州刺史. (資治通鑑/卷277) Around 940.3.25 started a rebellion against Yanxi. In 940.7.8 they made peace. In 941.2.4 made 鎮安軍節度使, but he renamed the title to 鎮武. (資治通鑑/卷282) In 942.7.3 besieged 汀州. In 943.4.5 declared himself an Emperor of 大殷. (資治通鑑/卷283) In 945.3.14 became Emperor of Min. In 945.8.11 sent an emissary to swear allegiance to Wuyue and request reinforcements. (資治通鑑/卷284) In 945.10.2 surrendered to Southern Tang and was sent off to Jinling. (資治通鑑/卷285) In 947 made 安化節度使、鄱陽王，鎮饒州. (資治通鑑/卷287) In 951 made honorary 山南西道節度使 and 光山王. (資治通鑑/卷290)

In 927.2.20 returned to Jianzhou. (資治通鑑/卷275) 奉國節度使、知建州 in 930.1.3. On that day fell sick and retired to his household. In 931.5.6 captured and imprisoned by 王延鈞. 1407010 = { #陳照 Chen Zhao. Married 徐堅 and gave birth to 徐琨. In 929 he died and in 931 she married 盧全善 who was 江陽縣令 when she died and later was made 三原縣令.. (大唐潁川郡夫人三原縣令盧全壽故夫人陳氏墓誌銘并序). Read 唐代士族女兒與家族光榮──從天寶四年〈陳照墓誌〉談起

(舊唐書/卷17上) 河東節度使 until 830.3.28, on that day made 河中尹、河中晉絳節度使. (舊唐書/卷17下) In 832.8.4 moved back to court. (舊唐書/卷17下) In 833.8.17 made 汴州刺史、宣武軍節度使. (舊唐書/卷17下) In 835.6.30 reported as former 宣武軍節度使, on that day once again made 河中晉絳節度使. (舊唐書/卷17下) In 836.7.3 returned back to court. (舊唐書/卷17下) In 837.4.19 made 襄州刺史、山南東道節度使. (舊唐書/卷17下)

When 杜孺休 arrived in 890.8.31 Can was supposed to kill him, but 李友 took the prefecture instead. Can returned to Qian, who wanted to execute him, so he escaped to Sun Ru. (北齊書/卷21) After 560 made 魏尹. (北齊書/卷21) In 562 made 行冀州事. (墓誌銘) 行冀州事 until 563. (墓誌銘) In 564 made 行懷州事. (墓誌銘)

1800294 = { #封言道 Feng Yandao. In 640 made 駙馬都尉. In 641 married 淮南公主. In 642 made 汝州刺史. In 644 made 汴州刺史. In 653 made 寧州刺史. In 655 made 齊州刺史. In 656 made 蘄州刺史. In 663 made 金州刺史. In 665 made 虔州刺史. In 667 made 廣州刺史. In 675 made 滄州刺史. In 677 made 瀛洲刺史, soon after moved to 青州刺史. The same year made 檢校揚州大都督府長史. In 681 made 行并州大都督府長史. in 683 made 懷州刺史. In 684 made 汴州刺史. In 685 demoted to 貴州刺史. Soon after moved to 溫州刺史. Later to 滁州刺史. In 689 made 淄州刺史. In 690 made 普州刺史. In 692 made 婺州刺史. In 694 made 宋州刺史. (周故宋州刺史駙馬都尉上柱國蓨縣開國子封公墓志銘)

1800476 = { #苗晉卿 Miao Jinqing or 苗普卿 Miao Puqing* (大唐古朝散大夫行太子内置郎上柱國苗府君墓誌銘). In 743.2.21 demoted to 安康太守. (資治通鑑/卷215) In 744.3.19 made 魏郡太守, 河北采訪處置使 where he spend 3 years. (舊唐書/卷113) Later made 河東太守、河東采訪使. (舊唐書/卷113) 河東太守、河東采訪使 in 748.6.27. (大唐古朝散大夫行太子内置郎上柱國苗府君墓誌銘) Later 撫風郡太守. (舊唐書/卷113) Even later 東京留守. (舊唐書/卷113) Later made 陜州刺史、陜虢兩州防禦使, but refused to take the post and was retired. (舊唐書/卷113) (唐丞相故太保贈太師韓國公苗公墓誌銘) *In 大唐古朝散大夫行太子内置郎上柱國苗府君墓誌銘 the account of descent of Miao clan from Chu mirrors the one from 新唐書, with the exception that all mentions of 晉 are replaced by 普

#https://zh.wikisource.org/wiki/%E8%88%8A%E4%BA%94%E4%BB%A3%E5%8F%B2/%E5%8D%B72
#七月，帝遣氏叔琮率師伐之。未幾，泌州刺史趙璠越墉來降；隨州刺史趙匡琳臨陣就擒。
#http://www.360doc.com/content/19/0804/17/1302411_852957217.shtml
#裴倩 Pei Qian. NOT 尚書度支郎中贈尚書左僕射正平節公裴公神道碑銘

#To find In Mangluo:
#唐故朝議郎前守蓬州刺史樂安孫府君墓誌銘 孫讜
#唐故前左武衛平曹樂安孫府君墓誌銘 孫筥

#https://ctext.org/wiki.pl?if=gb&chapter=920304
# https://doi.org/10.1179/0737503414Z.00000000012
